reward.usage_notes: Use before Lightning Arrow. Link with Mirage Archer when available.

reward.usage_notes: Single target supplement. Place totem for additional DPS.

steps.description: Get Lightning Arrow and transition to main skill

reward.name: Lightning Arrow
reward.usage_notes: Main Skill. Excellent clear and single target with proper supports.

vendor.name: Lesser Multiple Projectiles Support
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Lightning Arrow for better clear coverage.

vendor.name: Frostblink
vendor.usage_notes: Better movement skill than Dash. Instant travel with chill.

steps.description: Purchase Herald of Ice for elemental damage

vendor.name: Herald of Ice
vendor.usage_notes: Cold damage aura. Good for Trinity Support synergy.

vendor.name: Elemental Damage with Attacks Support
vendor.usage_notes: Buy but don't use yet. Will be useful with Trinity Support.

steps.title: Lost in Love - Get Grace

reward.name: Grace
reward.usage_notes: Key defensive aura for Evasion. Essential for survivability.

steps.gear_focus: Focus on movement speed boots and life

steps.title: Sever the Right Hand - Get Artillery Ballista
steps.description: Get Artillery Ballista for better single target

reward.usage_notes: Main single target setup. Better than Shrapnel for bosses.

steps.description: Purchase Trinity Support - build defining gem

vendor.name: Trinity Support
